Hero.title: Mikołaj Gramowski
Hero.subtitle: Ambitious Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web & mobile solutions.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.paragraph1: I am an ambitious and dedicated junior full-stack developer with hands-on experience in building modern web and mobile applications. I specialize in TypeScript, React, Next.js, and NestJS. Through freelance work and a part-time backend developer role, I have delivered projects focused on clean code, reliable APIs, and responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
AboutMe.paragraph2: Currently studying Computer Science at NHL Stenden in the Netherlands, I continuously expand my skills and eagerly embrace new challenges. Outside of programming, I am passionate about fitness, especially gym workouts and swimming. I am looking for a position where I can contribute value to the team, gain experience, and grow under the guidance of experienced professionals.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.twirelabDescription: Developing APIs and backend logic using NestJS. Collaborating remotely with a small dev team.
Experience.freelanceDescription: Built full-stack websites and mobile apps for clients. Provided long-term maintenance and technical support.
Experience.dominosDescription: Delivered food orders accurately and efficiently under time pressure. Balanced work with academic commitments, showing strong time management.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.project1Description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with Next.js, NestJS, and Stripe integration. Focused on performance and scalability.
Projects.project2Description: A RESTful API to manage and showcase personal projects, built with NestJS and documented with Swagger.
Projects.project3Description: A React Native app for tracking workouts and fitness progress, with a focus on intuitive UI/UX.

Education.title: Education
Education.nhlDescription: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.
Education.megakDescription: Intensive training in React, MySQL & NestJS.
Education.borowczykDescription: Focused on HTML, CSS, Javascript, React & Node.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.testimonial1Quote: Mikołaj is a highly skilled and dedicated developer. His ability to quickly grasp complex requirements and translate them into elegant solutions is truly impressive. He was a key asset to our team.
Testimonials.testimonial2Quote: Working with Mikołaj was a pleasure. He is communicative, proactive, and consistently delivered high-quality work. I would highly recommend him for any full-stack development role.
Testimonials.testimonial3Quote: The passion Mikołaj brings to his projects is contagious. He's not just a coder; he's a problem solver who always strives for excellence. His contributions were invaluable.

Contact.title: Let's Connect
Contact.intro: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.

Footer.tagline: Crafting digital experiences, one line of code at a time.
Footer.builtWith: Built with passion using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.introductionContent: This Privacy Policy describes how Mikołaj Gramowski ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and shares information in connection with your use of our website (the 'Service'). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner.
PrivacyPolicyPage.informationCollectionContentP1: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you contact us via email or through a contact form. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide.
PrivacyPolicyPage.informationCollectionContentP2: We may also collect certain information automatically when you visit our website, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, and information about your usage of our Service. This information is collected using cookies and similar tracking technologies.
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationContent: We use the information we collect to: provide, maintain, and improve our Service; respond to your comments, questions, and requests; communicate with you about news, updates, and other information related to our Service; monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our Service; and for any other purpose with your consent.
PrivacyPolicyPage.informationSharingContent: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as website hosting, data analysis, and email delivery. We may also share information if required by law or to protect our rights or the rights of others.
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityContent: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
PrivacyPolicyPage.yourRightsContent: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your information. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
PrivacyPolicyPage.changesToPolicyContent: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice.
PrivacyPolicyPage.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TermsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.acceptanceContent: By accessing or using the website of Mikołaj Gramowski (the 'Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ('Terms'). If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.
TermsOfServicePage.useOfServiceContentP1: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for all of your activity in connection with the Service.
TermsOfServicePage.useOfServiceContentP2: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities: (i) copying, distributing, or disclosing any part of the Service in any medium, including without limitation by any automated or non-automated “scraping”; (ii) using any automated system, including without limitation “robots,” “spiders,” “offline readers,” etc., to access the Service in a manner that sends more request messages to the servers than a human can reasonably produce in the same period of time by using a conventional on-line web browser; (iii) attempting to interfere with, compromise the system integrity or security or decipher any transmissions to or from the servers running the Service.
TermsOfServicePage.intellectualPropertyContent: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Mikołaj Gramowski and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both Poland and foreign countries. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Mikołaj Gramowski.
TermsOfServicePage.disclaimersContent: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The Service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or course of performance.
TermsOfServicePage.limitationOfLiabilityContent: In no event shall Mikołaj Gramowski, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any content obtained from the Service; and (iv) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence) or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage, and even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose.
TermsOfServicePage.governingLawContent: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermsOfServicePage.changesToTermsContent: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
TermsOfServicePage.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

PageContent.heroSubtitle: Visionary Full Stack Developer | Architecting Next-Generation Web & Mobile Ecosystems.
PageContent.aboutParagraph1: A highly ambitious and dedicated Full Stack Developer, I possess extensive hands-on experience in architecting and delivering sophisticated, modern web and mobile applications. My core expertise lies in leveraging cutting-edge technologies like TypeScript, React, Next.js, and NestJS to build robust, scalable, and performant systems.
PageContent.aboutParagraph2: Through extensive freelance engagements and a pivotal part-time backend developer role, I have consistently delivered projects characterized by pristine code quality, highly reliable APIs, and intuitively responsive, user-centric interfaces. My commitment extends beyond mere functionality to encompass the holistic user experience and long-term maintainability of the software.
PageContent.aboutParagraph3: Currently pursuing an advanced degree in Computer Science at NHL Stenden in the Netherlands, I am on a perpetual journey of skill augmentation, eagerly embracing novel challenges and complex problem domains. Beyond the realm of programming, I am a fervent advocate for physical fitness, with a particular passion for rigorous gym workouts and endurance swimming. I am actively seeking a strategic position where I can deploy my skills to generate substantial value for a forward-thinking team, accrue invaluable experience, and achieve significant professional growth under the mentorship of seasoned industry veterans.
PageContent.experienceLeadArchitectDescription: Spearheading the design and development of next-generation APIs and distributed backend systems using NestJS, microservices architecture, and advanced data modeling. Driving innovation and mentoring junior developers within a high-performance remote team.
PageContent.experienceSeniorFullStackDescription: Delivered bespoke, full-stack web and mobile applications for a diverse international clientele. Specialized in complex problem-solving, performance optimization, and providing long-term strategic maintenance and technical leadership.
PageContent.experienceLogisticsDescription: Mastered high-pressure logistics and operational efficiency, ensuring precise and timely delivery execution. Successfully balanced demanding work schedules with rigorous academic commitments, demonstrating exceptional time management and resilience.
PageContent.educationNhlSubtitle: NHL Stenden University of Applied Sciences, Netherlands
PageContent.educationNhlDescription: Pursuing an advanced Bachelor's degree with a focus on Software Engineering, AI, and Big Data. Consistently achieving high academic standing while actively participating in research projects.
PageContent.educationMegakDescription: Completed an intensive, industry-recognized bootcamp focusing on enterprise-level React, advanced NestJS patterns, microservices, and DevOps practices with MySQL & Kubernetes.
PageContent.educationBorowczykTitle: Specialized Frontend Architecture Program by Bartlomiej Borowczyk
PageContent.educationBorowczykDescription: In-depth curriculum on advanced HTML5, CSS3, modern JavaScript (ESNext), performance-driven React, and scalable Node.js application architecture.
PageContent.skillsCertifications: Certifications: English C1 (IELTS Academic - Score: 8.0), Advanced Cloud Practitioner (AWS)
PageContent.contactIntro: Ready to transform your digital vision into reality? Let's discuss how my expertise can elevate your next project to unprecedented heights.
PageContent.project1Description: A full-featured e-commerce solution with advanced inventory management, secure payments, and a personalized user experience. Built for scalability and performance.
PageContent.project2Description: A web application enabling multiple users to edit documents simultaneously, featuring operational transforms, presence indicators, and version history.
PageContent.project3Description: A cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, setting fitness goals, and connecting with a community of fitness enthusiasts. Includes personalized plans and progress analytics.
PageContent.testimonial1Quote: Mikołaj is an incredibly talented and dedicated developer. His ability to quickly grasp complex requirements and translate them into elegant, functional code is truly impressive. A true asset to any team!
PageContent.testimonial1Role: Senior Project Manager, Tech Solutions Inc.
PageContent.testimonial2Quote: Working with Mikołaj was a fantastic experience. He consistently delivered high-quality work, showed great initiative, and his communication skills are top-notch. Highly recommended!
PageContent.testimonial3Quote: The passion Mikołaj brings to his projects is contagious. He's not just a coder; he's a problem solver who always strives for excellence. His contributions were invaluable.
